data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Tung T., Tran, Binh T. T., Nguyen, Anh D. (2015): Three new earthworm species of the genus Polypheretima Michaelsen, 1934 (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3905 (4): 593-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.4.11
